title: LAMB ROGAN JOSH
directions: Add all paste ingredients (except for lamb rump) in to mixer bowl. Blend for 10 sec/speed 8/MC on. Scrape bowl down and repeat once.
Marinate lamb in the fridge overnight or for at least 6 hours.
Add the ginger and garlic to mixer bowl. Chop for 3 sec/speed 9/MC on. Scrape bowl down and repeat once or until ginger is finely chopped.
Except for the yoghurt, add remaining curry ingredients to mixer bowl, including 100 g or 3.5 oz water and marinated lamb. Cook for 20 mins/steaming temperature/speed 1/MC on or until meat is tender.
Remove cinnamon stick, add yoghurt to curry sauce and mix for 10 sec/speed 2/MC on. Season to taste.
ingredients: 20 g fresh ginger, sliced into round coins
2 x medium brown onions, peeled, quartered
2 x large red chilli, roughly chopped (increase for a spicer curry)
700 g lamb rump steak, diced small
20 g fresh ginger, sliced into round coins
400 g tin of diced tomato (Ardmona brand)
